feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 12:30 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -19.8°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
